attributes.action: ensure that terrestrial channels show ONLY the actual match, game, etc. and NOT also the pre or post-match discussion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a cause of great annoyance to non-sports fans; it's bad enough that the actual match or whatever takes up most of an evening without having the discussion as well!  In any case why do sports programmes NEED discussion? I've never seen discussions in any other sort of programme (unless it's an integral part of the programme; e.g. Question Time).  

I admit that I have created a similar petition before.  I am now concerned, however, by reports that the Government is currently considering the "Crown Jewels" of sports programmes; I fear this will mean even MORE sport on terrestrial T.V. so the point about discussion is that much more trenchant.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual broadcasters.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
